title: WARDS LAST LONGER NOW
body: Why does it feel like wards last longer to disappear then before so the ones that can't kill the wards before it does now can is this a bug, glitch something or have they added something in?? I'm confused

replies.body: It wasn't noted, I believe, but it was definitely changed. Maybe it's a bug with the way the animations for the newest ward skins were coded. There's also been instances of people placing down wards with skins they don't own, which may be related to this.
